title: Intermittent activity
body:
Things to do today:

1. Pack
2. Contact vendors
3. Pack
4. Contact distributors
5. Pack
6. Contact bank folk
7. Pack
8. Go buy packing bubbles
9. Pack
10. Lunch
11. Pack
12. Have utilities shut off in STL and turned on in SPFD
13. Pack
14. Schedule theater meetings for next week
15. Pack
16. Pop packing bubbles
17. Pack
18. Get scolded by Nicole for doing #16
19. Pack
20. Repeat #16... quietly

Posting activity will be intermittent for the next week or so, but fear not, I've got a few blog-related surprises up my sleeves that are really starting to itch, so I should be shaking them out in the near future.

Word to your mother.
author: Dan

comments.author: einahpets
comments.body: I wish I was there to help...I'm just sitting, waiting for something to do.

comments.author: nicole
comments.body: I haven't seen you do any packing yet today...

comments.author: Stephanie
comments.body: How exciting!  I really have a lot of respect for you two...what you're doing is pretty darn close to incredible.  No, wait...it IS incredible.  Have fun packing...
